title: Clear immigration before you fly: UAE and Bahrain launch ‘One-Point Air Travellers’ project
summary_full: The UAE and Bahrain have launched the "One-Point Air Travellers" Project, a pilot initiative allowing citizens to complete entry procedures before departure. This aims to reduce airport congestion, accelerate entry, and enhance the travel experience. The project utilizes electronic connectivity, biometric verification, and advanced data processing to foster regional integration and smarter mobility.
